ingredients: 1   +   1/2 cups persimmon pulp, 1 teaspoon baking soda,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground cloves, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1  egg, 1 cup chopped pecans, 1 cup golden raisins
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 3g 17%, Cholesterol 14mg 5%, Sodium 105mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 27g 10%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 7mg 34%, Calcium 28mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 96mg 2%
